alert.note: Alert for Goodhue (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 4:30PM CDT until May 19 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN GOODHUE COUNTY... At 430 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wanamingo, or 17 miles southwest of Red Wing, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Goodhue around 440 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Minnesota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
